title: Love N Gore
description: In a world where falling in love makes you stronger, Molly is forced into entering a hellish arena called Love and Gore by her new boyfriend, Desmond Tresno. Turns out that her first opponent is actually Desmond's ex-girlfriend, whom he's still not over with. Will Molly be able to find true love and survive the bloody battleground?
author: Ibenq Turbo
